## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (-13.5, 23.5)
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 21.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)

### Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Pipe Group at position (-4.5, 16.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-9.5, 22.5) - Status: FULL OUTPUT
- Pipe Group at position (-9.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-7.5, 24.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-4.5, 24.5) - Status: EMPTY

### Electricity Network
- Electricity Group at position (-3.6666666666666665, 20.214285714285715) - Status: NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK

### Stone Furnace
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO INGREDIENTS

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before placing a pipe-to-ground. Check the target location for obstructions.
- Verify that you have the necessary pipes in your inventory before attempting to place them.

### Connection Errors with Underground Pipes
- Double-check the connection path between underground pipes to ensure they are aligned correctly and within connection range.

### Errors with Entity Status
- Steam engines and boilers must be connected properly to function. Ensure all components of the electricity generator are correctly connected.
- Make sure the electricity network is properly connected to the electricity group to avoid the "NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK" status.

### Inventory Management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary items before attempting to place or connect entities.
